extendedInfo.description: Hall.com is the first messaging application built for business. Use Hall.com for private group chat, instant messaging (IM, video chat, screen sharing) for companies and teams.Features: * Group Chat Rooms - Create a room to stay connected with your team. Rooms can be open for anyone in your company to join, or set to private for only invited members. Features include chat, @mentions, inline previews, file sharing and notes. Conversations are searchable across all devices. * Instant Messaging - Have something private to say? Start a side conversation with a teammate or professional contact. Instant messaging chat history is stored on the cloud making chat history available across all your devices. * Video Chat (Desktop and Web Only)  - Meet with your team face-to-face to increase your teamâs productivity with meetings that hold up to 12 people and powerful tools like screen sharing.* Screen Sharing (Desktop and Web Only)  - Show your team exactly what you're talking about. You can share your entire desktop or select a single application window.* Desktop, Web and Mobile - The Hall desktop app runs on Windows and Mac. The Hall web app is 6 times faster than existing enterprise solutions. Stay connected to Hall 24/7 with the free mobile web app and the iPhone app. * Connect Hall with your Google Contacts to instantly connect with all your colleagues.GET STARTED FOR FREE

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: We use Hall as a communication tool in our office. Unfortunately, the Android app gives nothing but a blank screen with a black bar across the top on my S3. Useless in its current state. The desktop client is buggy. Going with Hall as a communication solution was a mistake.
reviews.author: Dave Blohm

reviews.title: Web app is great, mobile web and android are unusable
reviews.comment: I use and quite like the web app, but between the inability to navigate the mobile web page on my HTC One and the extremely slow and buggy android app, consider the service inaccessible from your phone.
reviews.author: Andrew Coats

reviews.title: Great Productivity App
reviews.comment: I love using Hall for my company and the app lets me stay connected while on the go.
reviews.author: Johnny Lee

reviews.title: Update makes app non-functional
reviews.comment: Since the updates my app doesn\'t function as it once did. It used to be smooth and fast, but now I can\'t get notifications. I have to go on mobile web to see what was said. I can\'t sign in and when I it\'s a white screen that says close, when I press it it goes into a black screen and a min later it pops up. I have to go into the app store to get it to open correctly and sometimes it doesn\'t then. When I go into a different app, Hall automatically signs me out making me having to resign in.
reviews.author: Ash Cash

reviews.title: Way better than Yammer
reviews.comment: My team tried everything, yammer, podio, you name it. We ended up choosing Hall and have found ourselves loving the product more and more. I highly recommend your company use Hall for real-time communications!
reviews.author: John Pickly

reviews.title: Not working properly
reviews.comment: In samsung galaxy tab2 the screen have some extra window below please remove this
reviews.author: Sudhir Jain

reviews.title: Very Poor
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my HTC One. Just a blank page with a black bar at the top. Does nothing.
reviews.author: Yulian Kuncheff

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on HTC Droid phone
reviews.author: Jessica Sattler

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Probably the best work messaging app out there.
reviews.author: Andrew McSherry

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Makes staying in touch with my teams throughout the day and when traveling very easy.newer version is much more stable.  I uninstalled because I was getting push notifications when signed out, but just now found that is a room based setting.  Would be nice to be able to manage all of that from one settings page.  Then I\'d go 5 stars.
reviews.author: Brandon Brown

reviews.title: Excellent product excellent app
reviews.comment: Just updated looks amazing can\'t wait to see how well it works already worlds better than version 1
reviews.author: James D. Harrington

reviews.title: Blank screen
reviews.comment: I get a blank screen when I launch the app on my HTC One.
reviews.author: Liz Jensen

reviews.comment: It does not work on my brand new HTC One.
reviews.author: David Jensen
